Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.Message.Action.RefusedAction

Class RefusedActionMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.Message.MessageToClient
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.Message.Action.AnswerToActionMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.Message.Action.RefusedAction.RefusedActionMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RefusedActionMessage extends AnswerToActionMessage
This message is used when server needs to notify a player of an error occurred while performing a certain action (e.g. placing or picking card)
